text: Where are you going?
I don't know. Just wander.
I worry about you alone, though.
You know, those Duttons are always going to
use your fear against you.
If I can ever teach you to be fearless.
Then you would truly have the world lift,
that you would have everything you ever
wanted. You know, you almost have everything
now. You got the second most powerful office
in the state. You got the child.
And a woman who believes in you.
Look at this. This is yours.
Most people, the best they can hope is to
dream about something like this.
You know, most people they don't even know
something like this exists to dream about.
I'm 61 years old and these last months I.
Well, they made all the 60 years of f***ing
hell I endured worth it.
Don't you let those f***ing Duttons deceive
you into thinking you're a bad man.
You're a good man, son.
And I love you.
I love you too, dad.
Stop.
Turn around. You should have picked

Three's going to be worse.
Cause your f***ing mine now.
